scripts.unit-coverage: go clean -testcache && go test -tags=unit -coverprofile=coverage.out ./... && go tool cover -html=coverage.out -o coverage.html && open coverage.html
scripts.integration: docker compose -f docker-compose.integration.yaml down -v && docker compose -f docker-compose.integration.yaml up --build --force-recreate --exit-code-from integration-test
scripts.bootstrap: PRISMA_PROVIDER='go run github.com/steebchen/prisma-client-go' PRISMA_OUTPUT='../../apps/prisma/db' go run github.com/steebchen/prisma-client-go generate --schema=../../packages/prisma/schema.prisma
